sliding_text.text: Welcome to De Gouden Draak. Click on this text to see this week's offers!

home.best_takeaway_meals: For years, De Gouden Draak has been the restaurant when it comes to the best takeaway dishes in 's-Hertogenbosch.
home.authentic_meals: We are happy to treat you to authentic dishes from the Cantonese cuisine.
home.three_meal_choices: Choose from 3 of the following dishes:

meals.chicken_breast: Chicken breast in Black Bean sauce

home.with_white_rice: With white rice. (Nasi or noodles for an extra charge.)

contact.description: De Gouden Draak is easy to find, close to the center, a 5-minute walk behind the central station.

news.content:
Due to the Corona crisis, De Gouden Draak is only open to a limited extent at the moment.
The restaurant area is closed. You can still pick up your favorite dishes.
